1604066329_mirrored_yurivict_github.body: Hi, I thought ZeroNet is such a cool project and since I see some help wanteds here, I want to help with fixing it. However, I don't know where to start. Could you tell me where to start if I want to fix this issue?
I understand. Maybe you could point me to one where you think I could begin with since reading through all the issue it's hard for me to tell.
